poem:
Title: Listening Through Silence

Unseen melodies pass the silence's gate,
deaf actors ushering notes unplayed.
Prejudices float, fears await,
communication's art by isolation swayed.
Rent - a mission inside the quiet blank,
To traverse the abyss twixt hearing and unheard,
to stage a hazard, to bridge a rank,
telling the story in actions, not word.
An echo within the heart's silent chamber.
